nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.persistence

Class Persistence_Impl

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.persistence.Persistence_Impl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistence

    public class Persistence_Impl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Persistence
    Implements the Persistence interface. Saves to disk in a JSON format, reads from disk files saved in JSON format
